title: 求一个1.12.2的mod
author: tianqi482
txt_content: 什么mod能改方块的硬度、爆炸抗性和滑度？

replies.author: CYstars
replies.txt_content: https://www.mcmod.cn/class/1497.html拿走不送魔改一下就可以了兄弟！
